languages.text: "Ты... прав{mf||а}. Все наши жизни принадлежат Императору — никто не вправе отбирать их у Него без нужды. Те, кто могли бы искупить грехи, сражаясь с врагами Человечества в сей мрачный час, бессмысленно гибнут, лишившись привилегии послужить Императору. Инцендия мнит себя выше Него, а это — величайшее преступление".

traits.locale_text: "Действительно. Все наши жизни принадлежат Императору — никто не вправе отбирать их у Него без нужды. Те, кто могли бы искупить свои грехи, сражаясь с врагами Человечества в сей мрачный час, бессмысленно гибнут, лишившись привилегии послужить Императору. Инцендия возомнила себя выше Него, а это — величайшая ересь".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "You... are right. All our lives belong to the Emperor, and no one has the right to needlessly take them away from Him. People who, in this dark hour, could have atoned in battle against the enemies of Humanity, are instead perishing senselessly, robbed of their privilege to serve the Emperor. Incendia thinks herself above Him, and that is an egregious crime."
languages.original_text: "Ты... прав{mf||а}. Все наши жизни принадлежат Императору — никто не вправе отбирать их у Него без нужды. Те, кто могли бы искупить грехи, сражаясь с врагами Человечества в сей мрачный час, бессмысленно гибнут, лишившись привилегии послужить Императору. Инцендия мнит себя выше Него, а это — величайшее преступление".

traits.locale_text: "You... are right. All our lives belong to the Emperor, and no one has the right to needlessly take them away from Him. People who, in this dark hour, could have atoned for their sins in battle against the enemies of Humanity, are instead perishing senselessly, robbed of their privilege to serve the Emperor. Incendia thinks herself above Him, and that is an egregious crime."

languages.text: “你……说得没错，我们所有人的生命都属于帝皇，没人有权无谓地处死祂的仆从。在这至暗的时刻，许多人本可以与人类大敌战斗，以此为自己的灵魂赎罪，可这些人却毫无意义地死了，再也没有能为帝皇服务的机会。因森蒂娅以为自己可以凌驾于帝皇之上，这实在是罪大恶极。”
languages.original_text: "You... are right. All our lives belong to the Emperor, and no one has the right to needlessly take them away from Him. People who, in this dark hour, could have atoned in battle against the enemies of Humanity, are instead perishing senselessly, robbed of their privilege to serve the Emperor. Incendia thinks herself above Him, and that is an egregious crime."

traits.locale_text: “你……说得没错，我们所有人的生命都属于帝皇，没人有权无谓地处死塔的欧聪。在这至暗的时刻，许多人本可以与人类大敌战斗，以此为自己的灵魂赎罪，可这些人却毫无意义地死了，再也没有能为帝皇服务的机会。因森蒂娅以为自己可以凌驾于帝皇之上，这实在是罪大恶极。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「お前は…正しい。私達全員の命は皇帝のものであり、それを主の手からむやみに奪う権利は誰にもない。この暗黒の時代において、人々は人類の敵との戦いで償う可能性があった。だが、皇帝に仕える特権を奪われ、無意味に死んでいった。インセンディアは、自分を主の上に立つ存在だと信じきっている。それはとんでもない罪だ」
languages.original_text: "You... are right. All our lives belong to the Emperor, and no one has the right to needlessly take them away from Him. People who, in this dark hour, could have atoned in battle against the enemies of Humanity, are instead perishing senselessly, robbed of their privilege to serve the Emperor. Incendia thinks herself above Him, and that is an egregious crime."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は…正しい。私達全員の命は皇帝のものであり、それを主の手からむやみに奪う権利は誰にもない。この暗黒の時代において、人々は人類の敵との戦いで償う可能性があった。だが、皇帝に仕える特権を奪われ、無意味に死んでいった。インセンディアは、自分を主の上に立つ存在だと信じきっている。それはとんでもない罪だ」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Tiene... razón. Nuestras vidas pertenecen al Emperador y nadie tiene derecho a arrebatárselas innecesariamente. Gente que en estos momentos de oscuridad podría haber expiado sus delitos en la batalla con los enemigos de la Humanidad y en cambio, muere, despojada de su privilegio de servir al Emperador. Incendia se cree por encima de Él y eso es un crimen atroz».
languages.original_text: "You... are right. All our lives belong to the Emperor, and no one has the right to needlessly take them away from Him. People who, in this dark hour, could have atoned in battle against the enemies of Humanity, are instead perishing senselessly, robbed of their privilege to serve the Emperor. Incendia thinks herself above Him, and that is an egregious crime."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene... razón. Nuestras vidas pertenecen al Emperador y nadie tiene derecho a arrebatárselas innecesariamente. Gente que en estos momentos de oscuridad podría haber expiado sus transgresiones en la batalla con los enemigos de la Humanidad y en cambio, muere, despojada de su privilegio de servir al Emperador. Incendia se cree por encima de Él y eso es un crimen atroz».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Ihr ... habt recht. All unsere Leben gehören dem Imperator, und niemand hat das Recht, sie ihm ohne Not wegzunehmen. Menschen, die Buße tun könnten, indem sie die Feinde der Menschheit bekämpfen, sterben stattdessen sinnlos. Weil man sie ihres Privilegs beraubt hat, dem Imperator zu dienen. Incendia glaubt, sie stehe über ihm, und das ist ein schändliches Verbrechen."
languages.original_text: "You... are right. All our lives belong to the Emperor, and no one has the right to needlessly take them away from Him. People who, in this dark hour, could have atoned in battle against the enemies of Humanity, are instead perishing senselessly, robbed of their privilege to serve the Emperor. Incendia thinks herself above Him, and that is an egregious crime."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ... habt recht. All unsere Leben gehören dem Imperator, und niemand hat das Recht, sie ihm ohne Not wegzunehmen. Menschen, die in dieser dunklen Stunde für ihre Sünden büßen könnten, indem sie die Feinde der Menschheit bekämpfen, sterben stattdessen sinnlos. Weil man sie ihres Privilegs beraubt hat, dem Imperator zu dienen. Incendia glaubt, sie stehe über ihm, und das ist ein schändliches Verbrechen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Vous... avez raison. Nos vies appartiennent à l'Empereur et nul n'a le droit de les Lui arracher sans raison. Ceux qui, en ces heures sombres, auraient pu se racheter en affrontant les ennemis de l'humanité, se voient privés du privilège de servir l'Empereur et meurent inutilement. Incendia semble se croire au-dessus de Lui, ce qui constitue un crime des plus odieux. »
languages.original_text: "You... are right. All our lives belong to the Emperor, and no one has the right to needlessly take them away from Him. People who, in this dark hour, could have atoned in battle against the enemies of Humanity, are instead perishing senselessly, robbed of their privilege to serve the Emperor. Incendia thinks herself above Him, and that is an egregious crime."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison... Nos vies appartiennent à l'Empereur et nul n'a le droit de les Lui arracher sans raison. Ceux qui, en ces heures sombres, auraient pu racheter leurs péchés en affrontant les ennemis de l'humanité, se voient privés du privilège de servir l'Empereur et meurent inutilement. Incendia semble se croire au-dessus de Lui, ce qui constitue un crime des plus odieux. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Aslında... Haklısın. Hepimizin yaşamı İmparator'a aittir ve bu yaşamı O'ndan gereksiz yere almaya kimsenin hakkı yoktur. Bu karanlık zamanlarda, İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı verilen savaşta faydalanılabilecek insanlar manasızca yok ediliyor ve İmparator'a hizmet etme ayrıcalığı onlardan alınıyor. İncendia, kendisinin O'nun üzerinde olduğunu sanıyor. Bu muazzam bir suçtur."
languages.original_text: "You... are right. All our lives belong to the Emperor, and no one has the right to needlessly take them away from Him. People who, in this dark hour, could have atoned in battle against the enemies of Humanity, are instead perishing senselessly, robbed of their privilege to serve the Emperor. Incendia thinks herself above Him, and that is an egregious crime."

traits.locale_text: "Aslında... Haklısın. Hepimizin yaşamı İmparator'a aittir ve bu yaşamı O'ndan gereksiz yere almaya kimsenin hakkı yoktur. Bu karanlık zamanlarda, İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı verilen savaşta faydalanılabilecek insanlar manasızca yok ediliyor, İmparator'a hizmet etme ayrıcalığı onlardan alınıyor. İncendia kendisinin O'nun üzerinde olduğunu sanıyor ve bu muazzam bir suçtur."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
